title: Cannot record objects with both isX and getX
body:
### Describe the bug

If an object with both `getX` and `isX` getter is passed to a recorder, the field `x` remains null, causing subtle bugs that are hard to detect.

### Expected behavior

If an object with both `getX` and `isX` getter is passed to a recorder, the field `x` is set to the value returned by `getX`.

### Actual behavior

The field `x` remains null.

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/Christopher-Chianelli/issue-reproducer/tree/quarkus-recorder-is-get-error

1. Clone repo
2. `cd quarkus-issue-reproducer`
3. `mvn clean install`
4. Notice test fails

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux 5.18.11-200.fc36.x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.3" 2022-04-19

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.10.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

apache-maven-3.8.4

### Additional information

_No response_
